Text: RE thank you letterNo problem Ill put in by tomorrow Geo Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday January PM To Margoliner George Subject RE thank you letter take it to the credit union and deposit it Well use it for computers books kh Original Message From Margoliner George Sent Wednesday January PM To Hyatt Kevin Subject RE thank you letter Kevin I still have a check to deposit for Enron Kids What should I do with it Let me know your thoughts Thanks Geo Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday January PM To Geneva Davis Email Lesli Campbell Email Mann Ruth Cc Millar John Margoliner George Smith Mike J Rush Pamela Lee Dennis Subject FW thank you letter I sent this to the smith and enronx website masters kh Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday January PM To Subject thank you letter I am writing to you as Cochair of the Enron Kids program A lot of exEnron folks who use your website were involved in this years Gordon Elementary School adoption program Many of these people sacrificed some of their own Christmas so that kids at Gordon Elementary would not be let down I would like them to know that their efforts were truly appreciated by the students faculty and especially those of us on the Committee Would you please consider posting on your site the attached thankyou letter from the school thank you Kevin Hyatt CoChair Enron Kids Committee File GordonThankYoudoc

RE thank you letterKevin I still have a check to deposit for Enron Kids What should I do with it Let me know your thoughts Thanks Geo Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday January PM To Geneva Davis Email Lesli Campbell Email Mann Ruth Cc Millar John Margoliner George Smith Mike J Rush Pamela Lee Dennis Subject FW thank you letter I sent this to the smith and enronx website masters kh Original Message From Hyatt Kevin Sent Wednesday January PM To Subject thank you letter I am writing to you as Cochair of the Enron Kids program A lot of exEnron folks who use your website were involved in this years Gordon Elementary School adoption program Many of these people sacrificed some of their own Christmas so that kids at Gordon Elementary would not be let down I would like them to know that their efforts were truly appreciated by the students faculty and especially those of us on the Committee Would you please consider posting on your site the attached thankyou letter from the school thank you Kevin Hyatt CoChair Enron Kids Committee File GordonThankYoudoc
